### Path Package

```{r}
fs::path_package("thaipdf", "preTeX")
system.file("preTeX", package ="thaipdf" )

fs::path_package("thaipdf", "templates")
system.file("templates", package ="thaipdf" )
```


Error if not exist

```{r}
fs::path_package("thaipdf", "foo")

```
